title: Vladimir?
body:
Anyone else feel like {{champion:8}} Vladimir needs a little buff?
* His damage is not as great as the other** top laners** i meet.
* His W isn't such a great CC. It doesn't even remove enemy "dot" damage, (like Teemo's)

BUT MOSTLY IMPORTANT: Make it worth to get 4 stacks of E. Getting 4 stacks of E is hard to achieve until you have all the spell vamps items you need. It costs health, takes time and the buff vanishes slowly. Yes it gives "increased health regeneration and more attack damage" but i don't think it's such a great deal.
I was thinking of giving him a _"True Vampire Form"_. Aesthetically, it would something like this http://http://imgur.com/6c5LmM6
The True Vamprie Form could give him some attack speed to go along with the E increased attack damage buff. Nothing else, or it would be too strong. :)
